local_intent: Perceive white_plate, compute grasp pose, move above, align, execute pick with retries, verify grasp stability and object in gripper
assumptions: White plate is visible to the camera
Gripper is open and capable of the planned grasp
Shared key 'white_plate_grasp' is available for write/read
coherence_with_global: Implements the 'grasp' phase from GLOBAL_BT and GLOBAL_DESCRIPTION: DetectObject -> ComputeGraspPose -> MoveAbove -> ApproachAndAlign -> Pick -> verify, using binned timeouts and allowed strategies.
